DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY & TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: IBM to Terminate European Accord : International Business Machines Corp . said it will end the 1984 agreement that settled a European Commission investigation of the company ' s alleged anti-competitive practices . IBM had agreed with the commission to supply information to rivals on product attachments , computer memory and software . But the computer maker said those commitments are no longer necessary in an age of " open " computer_systems .
